flowtrend 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Rand index between responsibilities.

rand.Rd

Rand index between responsibilities.

Usage

rand(resp_list1, resp_list2, times = NULL, smaller = TRUE, prop = 0.1)

Arguments

resp_list1

One list.

resp_list2

Another list.

times

A subset of the time points (out of 1:length(resp_list1)) to examine.

smaller

If TRUE, use only a small (sampled) subset of the particles' responsibilities for calculating RAND.

prop

How much to downsample; defaults to 0.1.

On this page
